summary: Project SGO-Booking (hotel booking app). Current focus: resolve deployment instability on Caffeine (missing publish URL/Open App, intermittent deploy errors) and address legacy room photo/data cleanup—specifically enabling Admin to delete a full room entry (photo + associated room details/description) so stale metadata doesn’t remain visible after photo deletion.
architectural_notes: Prefer admin-side bulk/complete deletion workflow (room record + photo + related metadata) to avoid manual backend cleanup for legacy data.
known_issues: Caffeine deploy instability: publish URL/Open App button not shown even after successful deploy; redeploy can fail with 'Deployment error'.
Deleting room photo via Admin does not remove associated room metadata/description (e.g., price/type), leaving description visible without photo in Admin/Guest views.

existing_features.title: Force a fresh deployment attempt by bumping the frontend build version string, then run build + deploy so Caffeine attempts a new publish and shows the Publish URL / “Open App” link.

Add a short admin-facing note in the app (Admin Panel) explaining that if the Caffeine platform UI fails to show the Publish URL / “Open App” after a successful deploy, it is a platform issue and the team will pause and retry later, without implying an application bug.

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin feature: delete room data as a whole (photo + associated room details/description) instead of only deleting the photo, to remove legacy/stale backend data cleanly
